title: Voxonomics 1-5
author: VD
content_html:
This one is a solo job, and as I intimated before, should serve as sufficient evidence explaining why I don’t aspire to radio stardom. Henceforth, I’m going to go to an every other week schedule, which should give me enough time to offload some of the production work to the Ilk who volunteered and actually schedule interviews before the last minute. But there still might be some useful things to consider here in the fifth podcast.

Recommended Reading:

The Wealth of Nations

Food Alarmism
